name: WordPress Abandoned Cart Pro for WooCommerce plugin文件上传漏洞
product: ["WordPress Abandoned Cart Pro for WooCommerce plugin <=9.16.0"]
description: WordPress和WordPress plugin都是WordPress基金会的产品。WordPress plugin是一个应用插件。WordPress Abandoned Cart Pro for WooCommerce plugin存在文件上传漏洞，该漏洞源于wcap_add_to_cart_popup_upload_files函数中缺少文件类型验证，攻击者可利用该漏洞上传任意文件。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://wordpress.org/plugins/axle-demo-importer/
patch: WordPress Abandoned Cart Pro for WooCommerce plugin文件上传漏洞的补丁
